titles.title: Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a study regarding the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area in Connecticut, and for other purposes.
Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary:
Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area Study Act
This bill directs the Department of the Interior to carry out a study on the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Naugatuck River Valley National Heritage Area in Connecticut.
